title: Video: BANKS – Change (SBTV Session)
body:
Recent BBC Sound of 2014 nominee **BANKS** stopped by the SBTV studios for this acoustic rendition of EP closer _Change_.

Stripping back much of the instrumentation, and relying almost solely on her sultry vocals, it’s a sign of the sort of diversity and talent that has earned her such high praise across the course of the past year.
